alert.note: Alert for Claiborne; Copiah; Jefferson; Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 3:47PM CDT until May 15 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Claiborne County in southwestern Mississippi... Northwestern Lincoln County in south central Mississippi... Eastern Jefferson County in southwestern Mississippi... Southwestern Copiah County in central Mississippi... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 347 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Barlow, or 17 miles southeast of Port Gibson, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Barlow around 400 PM CDT. Mcbride around 405 PM CDT. Allen, Pleasant Hill, Caseyville and Union Church around 430 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
